name: nuxeo-website-styles
description: Styles to be used on Nuxeo websites

scripts.dev: npm run server & nodemon --exec 'npm run compile && browser-sync reload'
scripts.compile_parallel: npm run compile:elements & p1=$!; npm run compile:styles & p2=$!; wait "$p1" "$p2"
scripts.compile: npm run compile:elements && npm run compile:styles
scripts.postcompile: rm -rf static/satellite/latest && mkdir -p static/satellite/latest && cp -r build/es5-bundled/* static/satellite/latest && cp -r css static/satellite/latest
scripts.npm_install: [ `npm run -s package_checksum` = `cat package.md5` ] || npm install && npm run -s package_checksum > package.md5
scripts.version: npm run npm_install && cp -r static/satellite/latest static/satellite/`node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version);"` && git add static/satellite && git commit -m "Satellite release `node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version);"` added"

author: Andrew Goodricke <github@andrewgoodricke.com> (http://www.nuxeo.com)
